message.content: {"given_definition_quality":20,"better_definition":"girlfriend; a girl who is someone's romantic partner","sentence":"他有女朋友。","image_prompt":"A cheerful young man standing next to a smiling young woman, the two holding hands like a couple, set against a visually simplified, soft apocalypse background with pastel skies and faded urban buildings. The style mimics soft animation with gentle color transitions, evoking both warmth and surreal, dreamy end-of-world vibes.","sentence_translation":"He has a girlfriend."}
